title: Episode 277: Throwback "Sticky Faith" with Guest Kara Powell!
description: We’ve all heard the stats about kids leaving the faith when they head for college - but why? And what would have made their faith more “sticky?” Has anyone done any actual research on this? Kara Powell has! Fuller Youth Institute Executive Director Kara Powell joins the gang to discuss her research and her book - Sticky Faith!
content:encoded: We’ve all heard the stats about kids leaving the faith when they head for college - but why?
